description.english: Capture all three Kujaras and bring it back to Pham.
description.french: Capture les trois Kujaras et amène-les à Pham.
description.german: Fange alle drei Kujaras und bringe sie zurück zu Pham.
description.italian: Cattura tutti e tre i Kujara e riportali da Pham.
description.japanese: クジャラを3匹全部捕まえ、ファムに持って帰る。
description.spanish: Captura a los tres Kujaras y llévaselos a Pham.

description.english: Reach max health.
description.french: Atteins les points de vie maximaux
description.italian: Raggiungi la salute massima.
description.japanese: 体力を最大値にする。
description.spanish: Incrementa tu vitalidad al máximo.

description.english: Obtain all types of pants.
description.french: Obtiens tous les types de pantalons.
description.italian: Ottieni tutti i pantaloni.
description.japanese: ズボンを全種類手に入れる。
description.spanish: Consigue todos los tipos de pantalones.

description.english: Obtain all types of suits.
description.french: Obtiens tous les costumes.
description.italian: Ottieni tutti gli abiti.
description.japanese: スーツを全種類手に入れる。
description.spanish: Consigue todos los trajes.

description.english: Obtain all types of weapons.
description.french: Obtiens tous les types d'armes.
description.italian: Ottieni tutte le armi.
description.japanese: 武器を全種類手に入れる。
description.spanish: Consigue todos los tipos de armas.

description.english: Obtain all types of complete spells.
description.french: Obtiens tous les types de sorts complets.
description.italian: Ottieni tutti i poteri completi.
description.japanese: 完全な呪文を全種類手に入れる。
description.spanish: Consigue todos los tipos de hechizos completos.

description.english: Obtain all types of keys.
description.french: Obtiens tous les types de clés.
description.italian: Ottieni tutte le chiavi.
description.japanese: 鍵を全種類手に入れる。
description.spanish: Consigue todos los tipos de llave.

description.english: Use the Pig Suit to talk to someone.
description.french: Utilise la Pig Suite pour parler à quelqu'un.
description.german: Nutze das Schweinekostüm um mit jemandem zu reden.
description.italian: Usa l'abito da maiale per parlare con qualcuno.
description.japanese: ブタのスーツを着て誰かに話しかける。
description.spanish: Utiliza el Traje de Cerdo para hablar con alguien.

description.english: Acquire the Traveler's Journal.
description.french: Acquiers le journal du voyageur.
description.italian: Ottieni il Diario del Viaggiatore.
description.japanese: 旅人の日記を手に入れる。
description.spanish: Consigue el Diario de Viajero.

description.english: Open the path to the treasure!
description.french: Ouvre la voie vers le trésor!
description.italian: Libera il percorso per il tesoro!
description.japanese: 宝への道を開け！
description.spanish: ¡Ábrete camino hasta el tesoro!

displayName.japanese: 合金トロッコで超スピード

description.english: Ride the trolley to the finish line under 1 minute and 10 seconds.
description.french: Conduis le chariot jusqu'à la ligne d'arrivée en moins de 1 minute et 10 secondes.
description.german: Erreiche das Ziel in der Lore in weniger als 1 Minute und 10 Sekunden.
description.italian: Completa la corsa con il vagone fino alla linea del traguardo in meno di 1 minuto e 10 secondi.
description.japanese: トロッコに乗り、1分10秒以内にゴールに到達する。
description.spanish: Conduce la carretilla hasta la línea de meta en menos de 1 minuto y 10 segundos.

description.english: Help the clown by putting the pillow beneath him while falling.
description.french: Aide le clown en plaçant un coussin sous lui lors de sa chute.
description.german: Hilf dem Clown, indem du das Kissen unter ihm platzierst während er fällt.
description.italian: Aiuta il clown mettendo un cuscino sotto di lui mentre è in caduta libera.
description.japanese: 落ちてくるピエロの下に枕を敷いて助ける。
description.spanish: Coloca la almohada para que el payaso caiga sobre ella.

description.english: Let the mermaid use the reassembled harp.
description.french: Laisse la sirène utiliser la harpe réparée.
description.german: Lass die Meerjungfrau auf der reparierten Harfe spielen.
description.italian: Permetti alla sirena di usare l'arpa riassemblata.
description.japanese: 組み立て直したハープを人魚に弾いてもらう。
description.spanish: Deja que la sirena use el arpa reconstruida.

description.english: Obtain the Golden Powder.
description.french: Obtiens le pouvoir doré.
description.italian: Ottieni la Polvere D'oro.
description.japanese: 金粉を手に入れる。
description.spanish: Consigue el Polvo Dorado.

description.english: Enter the Laughing Door in the laughing state.
description.french: Ouvre la porte qui rit en riant.
description.german: Betrete die lachende Türe während du selbst lachst.
description.italian: Entra nella Porta che Ride mentre ridi.
description.japanese: 笑い状態のときに笑い扉をくぐる。
description.spanish: Accede a la Puerta de la Risa riendo.

description.english: Enter the Crying Door in the crying state.
description.french: Ouvre la porte qui pleure en pleurant.
description.german: Betrete die weinende Türe während du selbst weinst.
description.italian: Entra nella Porta che Piange mentre piangi.
description.japanese: 泣き状態のときに泣き扉をくぐる。
description.spanish: Accede a la Puerta del Llanto llorando.

description.english: Clear Level 10 of washing the Kujara.
description.french: Termine le niveau 10 du lavage de Kujara
description.italian: Completa il livello 10 del lavaggio dei Kujara
description.japanese: クジャラ洗いのレベル10をクリアする。
description.spanish: Completa el Nivel 10 de limpiando el Kujara.

description.english: Use Holy Water on Baron.
description.french: Utilise l'eau bénite sur Baron.
description.german: Nutze das Heilige Wasser mit dem Baron.
description.italian: Utilizza l'Acqua Santa su Baron.
description.japanese: バロンの石像に聖水をかける。
description.spanish: Usa el Agua Bendita en Baron.

displayName.japanese: 小さなトンバ ミニトンバ

description.english: Make Tomba small with the Minitta Machine.
description.french: Rapetisse Tomba avec la machine Minitta.
description.italian: Rimpicciolisci Tombi utilizzando la Macchina Minitta
description.japanese: 機械でトンバを小さくする。
description.spanish: Encoge a Tombi con la Máquina Minitta.

description.english: Defeat the Water Evil Pig.
description.french: Vaincs le cochon d'eau malfaisant.
description.italian: Sconfiggi il Maiale Cattivo d'Acqua
description.japanese: 「水」の魔ブタを倒す。
description.spanish: Derrota al Cerdiablo del Agua.

description.english: Defeat the Fire Evil Pig.
description.french: Vaincs le cochon de feu malfaisant.
description.italian: Sconfiggi il Maiale Cattivo di Fuoco
description.japanese: 「炎」の魔ブタを倒す。
description.spanish: Derrota al Cerdiablo de Fuego.

description.english: Defeat the Earth Evil Pig.
description.french: Vaincs le cochon de terre malfaisant.
description.italian: Sconfiggi il Maiale Cattivo di Terra
description.japanese: 「大地」の魔ブタを倒す。
description.spanish: Derrota al Cerdiablo de la Tierra.

displayName.japanese: 封印！「ゴースト」の魔ブタ！！

description.english: Defeat the Ghost Evil Pig.
description.french: Vaincs le cochon de vent malfaisant.
description.italian: Sconfiggi il Maiale Cattivo Fantasma
description.japanese: 「ゴースト」の魔ブタを倒す。
description.spanish: Derrota al Cerdiablo del Viento.

description.english: Defeat the Ice Evil Pig.
description.french: Vaincs le cochon de glace malfaisant.
description.italian: Sconfiggi il Maiale Cattivo di Ghiaccio
description.japanese: 「氷」の魔ブタを倒す。
description.spanish: Derrota al Cerdiablo del Hielo.

description.english: Defeat the final Evil Pig and seal the last pig bag.
description.french: Vaincs le dernier cochon malfaisant et scelle le dernier sac de cochon.
description.german: Besiege das letzte böse Schwein und versiegele die letzte Schweinetasche.
description.italian: Sconfiggi l'Ultimo Maiale Cattivo e sigilla l'ultimo sacco.
description.japanese: 「最後」の魔ブタを倒し、最後のブタぶくろを封印する。
description.spanish: Derrota al Cerdiablo Final y séllalo.

description.english: Resolve the mystery around Tabby's disappearance.
description.french: Résouds le mystère de la disparition de Tabby.
description.german: Löse das Rätsel um Tabbys Verschwinden.
description.italian: Risolvi il mistero che ruota attorno la sparizione di Tabby.
description.japanese: 消えたパンジーの謎を解く。
description.spanish: Resuelve el misterio de la desaparición de Tabby.

description.english: Complete all events in the game.
description.french: Complète tous les évènements du jeu.
description.italian: Completa tutti gli eventi in gioco.
description.japanese: ゲーム内の全イベントをクリアする。
description.spanish: Completa todos los eventos del juego.

description.english: Get a flower from Ranch Area seeds and bring it to the dwarfs.
description.french: Obtiens une graine de fleur de Ranch Area et apporte-la aux nains.
description.german: Hol dir eine Blume mit den Samen im Ranch-Gebiet und bringe sie zu den Zwergen.
description.italian: Raccogli un fiore cresciuto da semi dell'Area Ranch e portalo agli gnomi.
description.japanese: 放牧地のタネから得た花をドワーフに持っていく。
description.spanish: Consigue una flor del Rancho y dásela a los enanos.

description.english: Find and bring back the mirror to Mizuno.
description.french: Trouve et rapporte le mirroir à Mizuno.
description.german: Finde den Spiegel und bringe ihn zurück zu Mizuno.
description.italian: Trova e riporta lo specchio a Mizuno.
description.japanese: カガミを見つけてミズノに持っていく。
description.spanish: Encuentra el espejo y dáselo a Mizuno.

description.english: Find Yan and talk to him.
description.french: Trouve et parle à Yan.
description.german: Finde Yan und rede mit ihm.
description.italian: Trova Yan e parlaci.
description.japanese: ヤンを見つけて話しかける。
description.spanish: Encuentra a Yan y habla con él.

description.english: Find and bring back the lost amulet to the 100 Year Old Wise Man.
description.french: Trouve et rapporte l'amulette perdue à l'homme sage centenaire.
description.german: Finde das verlorene Amulett und bringe es zum 100 Jahre alten Weisen Mann zurück.
description.italian: Trova e riporta l'amuleto perso al Vecchio Saggio Centenario
description.japanese: なくなっていたお守りを見つけ、100歳の賢者に持っていく。
description.spanish: Encuentra el amuleto perdido y dáselo al Sabio Anciano Centenario.
